findings.title: Array equality
findings.description: The function airdropACTIVE() uses recipients and tokenAmount arrays simultaneously but there is no checking of arrays to be equal length.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to pause/unpause the contract and perform airdrops to addresses during the period when the owner is not renounced.
